name: Stab-Like
description:
Stab-Like is a stabbing simulator about stabbing cyclops' in the face. Your quest is to get to the end of this very confusing labyrinth to save some random kidnapped person.

This was my Procedural Death Jam Entry, and my first ever game jam! I'm kind of happy with it. Maybe.

Music by Da Neel http://gamejolt.com/profile/da-neel/186377/

Originally released on March 16, 2014
